short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Obfuscate learner details from the Brightspace UI to reduce evaluation bias.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brightspace Debias is a simple tool designed to reduce unconscious bias in evaluations within the D2L Brightspace Learning Management System. By obfuscating learner details, this extension provides a more neutral grading environment, ensuring more fair and unbiased assessments and evaluations.

While Brightspace includes an Anonymous Marking feature, it is irreversible once a submission has been received. This plugin provides a non-destructive, reversible anonymization that can be toggled at any time.

It is common for learners to use their name as part of their submission's file name. If this is a concern, notify students that their submitted files must not include their name.
